skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yoga meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Anxiety Meditation is the alexa skill that allows you to perform guided meditations whenever you want. 
With more than 10 meditation sessions with different voices and background sounds lasting 10, 20 and 30 minutes, this skill will help your body and mind get rid of anxiety and stress.

With the Pro Features you will access to :

‣ professional voices
‣ different background sounds perfect for meditation sessions 
‣ no production limits.
‣ Continuously updated meditation paths 

We look forward to your reviews to improve and offer the best guide to meditation sessions.

Happy listening!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
